tweet_text: Each family will be connected with refugee resettlement organizations to help them begin their new lives in America. Our goal is to safely and efficiently welcome these allies and vulnerable Afghans, while taking all appropriate safety and public health measures.

tweet_text: Everyone will be tested for COVID on arrival in the U.S. and offered vaccines. Military bases are ready to take in SIV applicants and vulnerable Afghans for medical screenings, health care services, and other aid.

text_en: . Cybersecurity The infrastructure deal includes almost $2B to modernize and secure federal, state, and local IT and networks; protect key infrastructure and utilities; and invest in cyber training for Americans to fill skilled cyber jobs in the public and private sectors.

tweet_text:
8. Battery manufacturing — The infrastructure deal will invest $6B for advanced battery processing, manufacturing, and recycling to strengthen supply chains.

9. Transit station ADA program — The deal includes $2B to help remove barriers to service and expand mobility options.
text_en: . Battery manufacturing The infrastructure deal will invest $6B for advanced battery processing, manufacturing, and recycling to strengthen supply chains.9. Transit station ADA program The deal includes $2B to help remove barriers to service and expand mobility options.

tweet_text: 7. Safe streets — The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal includes $5B for a first-of-its-kind “Safe Streets for All” program to fund state and local “vision zero” plans and other improvements to reduce crashes and fatalities, especially for the most vulnerable roadways users.
text_en: . Safe streets The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal includes $5B for a first-of-its-kind Safe Streets for All program to fund state and local vision zero plans and other improvements to reduce crashes and fatalities, especially for the most vulnerable roadways users.

tweet_text:
5. Natural gas wells and coal mines — The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal invests $16B to cap wells and mines affecting urban and rural communities.

6. Pipeline safety — The deal includes $1B to modernize natural gas pipelines to reduce injuries, fatalities, and economic losses.
text_en: . Natural gas wells and coal mines The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal invests $16B to cap wells and mines affecting urban and rural communities.6. Pipeline safety The deal includes $1B to modernize natural gas pipelines to reduce injuries, fatalities, and economic losses.

tweet_text:
3. Flood Mitigation — The infrastructure deal includes $12B to boost coastal resilience, fund FEMA flood mitigation grants, and better mapping.

4. Brownfields and superfunds — The deal invests $5B to clean up legacy pollution that disproportionately impacts communities of color.
text_en: . Flood Mitigation The infrastructure deal includes $12B to boost coastal resilience, fund FEMA flood mitigation grants, and better mapping.4. Brownfields and superfunds The deal invests $5B to clean up legacy pollution that disproportionately impacts communities of color.

tweet_text: 2. Wildfires — The infrastructure deal invests $8B in wildfire risk reduction by providing funding for community wildfire defense grants, mechanical thinning, controlled burns, the Collaborative Forest Restoration Program, and firefighting resources.
text_en: . Wildfires The infrastructure deal invests $8B in wildfire risk reduction by providing funding for community wildfire defense grants, mechanical thinning, controlled burns, the Collaborative Forest Restoration Program, and firefighting resources.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal makes once-in-a-generation investments in our communities nationwide, including the creation of thousands of good-paying, union jobs. https://t.co/ORNQ5INgwo
text_en: Every American deserves the opportunity to provide for themselves and their family through dignified work. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal makes once-in-a-generation investments in our communities nationwide, including the creation of thousands of good-paying, union jobs.

text_en: Tune in for a briefing with Principal Deputy Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is proof that we can come together and take key steps towards building an economy and country that is sustainable, resilient, and just — all while creating good-paying union jobs, advancing environmental justice, and tackling climate change.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is proof that we can come together and take key steps towards building an economy and country that is sustainable, resilient, and just all while creating good-paying union jobs, advancing environmental justice, and tackling climate change.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will help put Americans to work nationwide and signal to the world that our democracy can deliver. Just as we did with the transcontinental railroad and the interstate highway, we will once again transform America and propel ourselves forward.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will help put Americans to work nationwide and signal to the world that our democracy can deliver. Just as we did with the transcontinental railroad and the interstate highway, we will once again transform America and propel ourselves forward.

tweet_text: Today President Biden visited Allentown, Pennsylvania where he delivered remarks on the importance of American manufacturing and this administration's commitment to creating good-paying, union jobs, right here at home. https://t.co/T7JdLjTtNk
text_en: Today President Biden visited Allentown, Pennsylvania where he delivered remarks on the importance of American manufacturing and this administration's commitment to creating good-paying, union jobs, right here at home.

tweet_text: Last month, the President announced a historic bipartisan deal to repair our nation’s infrastructure. Today, the President and key Senators reached a deal on the details of the package. https://t.co/QoZVMKy0qg
text_en: Last month, the President announced a historic bipartisan deal to repair our nations infrastructure. Today, the President and key Senators reached a deal on the details of the package.

tweet_text: Last (but certainly not least), the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will create thousands of good-paying union jobs, right here at home. And — the bill makes sure to require those new jobs provide fair wages and benefits, without undermining workers’ pay in local communities.
text_en: Last (but certainly not least), the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will create thousands of good-paying union jobs, right here at home. And the bill makes sure to require those new jobs provide fair wages and benefits, without undermining workers pay in local communities.

tweet_text: Internet is 21st century infrastructure. So just as the federal government made a historic investment to provide electricity to every American — the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal makes a historic investment to deliver reliable, affordable, high-speed internet to every household.
text_en: Internet is st century infrastructure. So just as the federal government made a historic investment to provide electricity to every American the Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal makes a historic investment to deliver reliable, affordable, high-speed internet to every household.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal’s more than $50B investment makes our communities safer and our infrastructure more resilient to the impacts of climate change and cyber-attacks. It includes funds to protect against droughts and floods, and a major investment in weatherization.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deals more than $50B investment makes our communities safer and our infrastructure more resilient to the impacts of climate change and cyber-attacks. It includes funds to protect against droughts and floods, and a major investment in weatherization.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will make the most significant investment in addressing legacy pollution in American history by funding a cleanup effort that will create good-paying union jobs and advance economic and environmental justice in communities hit hard by pollution.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will make the most significant investment in addressing legacy pollution in American history by funding a cleanup effort that will create good-paying union jobs and advance economic and environmental justice in communities hit hard by pollution.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is the largest investment in clean drinking water and waste water in American history, delivering clean drinking water to millions of families. It will replace all of the nation’s lead pipes and service lines.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is the largest investment in clean drinking water and waste water in American history, delivering clean drinking water to millions of families. It will replace all of the nations lead pipes and service lines.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is the first-ever national investment in electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure. It will also deliver thousands of electric school buses nationwide, including in rural communities.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal is the first-ever national investment in electric vehicle (EV) charging infrastructure. It will also deliver thousands of electric school buses nationwide, including in rural communities.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal’s $73B investment in clean energy transmission is the largest in U.S. history. The plan will upgrade our power infrastructure, building thousands of miles of new, resilient transmission lines to facilitate the expansion of renewable energy.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deals $73B investment in clean energy transmission is the largest in U.S. history. The plan will upgrade our power infrastructure, building thousands of miles of new, resilient transmission lines to facilitate the expansion of renewable energy.

tweet_text: Too often, transportation investments have divided communities or excluded those most in need. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal creates the first-ever program to reconnect communities – investing $1B in planning, design, demolition, reconstruction of street grids, and more.
text_en: Too often, transportation investments have divided communities or excluded those most in need. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal creates the first-ever program to reconnect communities investing $1B in planning, design, demolition, reconstruction of street grids, and more.

tweet_text: Across the country, bridges are failing and hurting local economies. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will allocate $40B to rebuilding our nation's bridges, the largest investment in bridge repairs since the construction of the Interstate Highway System.
text_en: Across the country, bridges are failing and hurting local economies. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will allocate $40B to rebuilding our nation's bridges, the largest investment in bridge repairs since the construction of the Interstate Highway System.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal invests $66B to eliminate the Amtrak maintenance backlog, modernize the Northeast Corridor, and bring world-class rail service to new areas. It is the largest investment in passenger rail since the creation of Amtrak 50 years ago.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal invests $66B to eliminate the Amtrak maintenance backlog, modernize the Northeast Corridor, and bring world-class rail service to new areas. It is the largest investment in passenger rail since the creation of Amtrak years ago.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will make the largest investment in public transit in history — it will repair and upgrade aging infrastructure, modernize bus and rail fleets, make stations accessible to all users, and bring transit service to new communities.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Deal will make the largest investment in public transit in history it will repair and upgrade aging infrastructure, modernize bus and rail fleets, make stations accessible to all users, and bring transit service to new communities.

tweet_text: Significant portions of the interstate highway system were built through Black neighborhoods, destroying homes, schools, churches, and parks and causing lasting disconnection and disinvestment for residents who stayed.

tweet_text:
Across the board, communities of color are more likely to be burdened by pollution.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework meets this challenge by investing in a clean energy grid which will mitigate pollution impacts, enhance reliability and resilience, and lower costs.
text_en: Across the board, communities of color are more likely to be burdened by pollution.The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework meets this challenge by investing in a clean energy grid which will mitigate pollution impacts, enhance reliability and resilience, and lower costs.

tweet_text: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework invests $52B to help communities build resilience by elevating roads and bridges, hardening physical infrastructure, and winterizing the power grid. It will also fund emergency response strategies and make it easier to buy flood insurance.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework invests $52B to help communities build resilience by elevating roads and bridges, hardening physical infrastructure, and winterizing the power grid. It will also fund emergency response strategies and make it easier to buy flood insurance.

tweet_text: People of color are more likely to live in areas most vulnerable to flooding and other climate change-related weather events. For example, in the wake of Hurricane Harvey, Black and Latino residents were twice as likely to report lost income.
text_en: People of color are more likely to live in areas most vulnerable to flooding and other climate change-related weather events. For example, in the wake of Hurricane Harvey, Black and Latino residents were twice as likely to report lost income.

tweet_text: 26% of Black Americans and 29% of Latino Americans live within three miles of a Superfund site. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework will invest $21B to clean up Brownfield and Superfund sites and remedy environmental hazards like abandoned mines and orphaned oil & gas wells.
text_en: % of Black Americans and % of Latino Americans live within three miles of a Superfund site. The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework will invest $21B to clean up Brownfield and Superfund sites and remedy environmental hazards like abandoned mines and orphaned oil & gas wells.

tweet_text:
Diesel air pollution is linked to asthma and health issues that disproportionately hurt communities of color.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework will deploy over 35,000 electric school buses nationwide, helping districts buy clean, American-made, zero-emission buses.
text_en: Diesel air pollution is linked to asthma and health issues that disproportionately hurt communities of color.The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework will deploy over electric school buses nationwide, helping districts buy clean, American-made, zero-emission buses.

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework's $48.5B investment will modernize transit, improve accessibility, and deploy thousands of zero-emissions vehicles. 

This investment in public transit will reduce commute times and create economic opportunities in communities of color.
text_en: The Bipartisan Infrastructure Framework's $48.5B investment will modernize transit, improve accessibility, and deploy thousands of zero-emissions vehicles. This investment in public transit will reduce commute times and create economic opportunities in communities of color.

tweet_text:

- Making the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit and the Earned Income Tax Credit expansion permanent
- Extending the Child Tax Credit in the American Rescue Plan
- Lowering health care costs
text_en: The Agenda will provide tax cuts to middle class families and workers, including:- Making the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit and the Earned Income Tax Credit expansion permanent- Extending the Child Tax Credit in the American Rescue Plan- Lowering health care costs

tweet_text: The Made in America Tax Plan will end the race to the bottom on corporate taxation and encourage job creation in the U.S. It will adopt a strong minimum tax on U.S. corporations and push other countries to do so, deny deductions for offshoring, and give a credit for onshoring.
text_en: The Made in America Tax Plan will end the race to the bottom on corporate taxation and encourage job creation in the U.S. It will adopt a strong minimum tax on U.S. corporations and push other countries to do so, deny deductions for offshoring, and give a credit for onshoring.

tweet_text: Right now, the tax code rewards U.S. multinational corporations shifting profits and jobs overseas with tax exemptions and discounts.

tweet_text: It provides $5 billion for emergency housing vouchers for people experiencing or at risk of homelessness — as well as $5 billion for the HOME Investment Partnerships Program to help create housing and services for people experiencing or at risk of homelessness.
text_en: It provides $5 billion for emergency housing vouchers for people experiencing or at risk of homelessness as well as $5 billion for the HOME Investment Partnerships Program to help create housing and services for people experiencing or at risk of homelessness.

tweet_text: The bill includes $10 billion to help homeowners behind on their mortgage and utility payments — helping avoid foreclosures.
